countries.name: United States
countries.funFact: The U.S. has no official national language.

countries.name: Canada
countries.funFact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.

countries.name: Germany
countries.funFact: Germany is known for having over 1,500 types of beer.

countries.name: Japan
countries.funFact: Japan is made up of over 6,800 islands.

countries.name: Australia
countries.funFact: Australia has more kangaroos than people.

countries.name: Brazil
countries.funFact: Brazil is the largest country in South America.

countries.name: India
countries.funFact: India is the second most populous country in the world.

countries.name: China
countries.funFact: China has the largest population in the world.

countries.name: United Kingdom
countries.funFact: The British Museum in London has a collection of over 8 million objects.

countries.name: France
countries.funFact: France is the most visited country in the world.

countries.name: Italy
countries.funFact: Italy is home to the largest number of UNESCO World Heritage Sites.

countries.name: Russia
countries.funFact: Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.

countries.name: Mexico
countries.funFact: Mexico introduced chocolate to the world.

countries.name: South Africa
countries.official_language: 11 official languages including English, Afrikaans, Zulu, Xhosa
countries.funFact: South Africa has three capital cities, each serving a different purpose.

countries.name: Argentina
countries.funFact: Argentina is the birthplace of the tango.

countries.name: Spain
countries.funFact: Spain has more bars per capita than any other country in the European Union.

countries.name: South Korea
countries.funFact: South Korea is the world leader in internet connectivity.

countries.name: Turkey
countries.funFact: Turkey is the only country that spans two continents: Europe and Asia.

countries.name: Colombia
countries.funFact: Colombia is the world's leading source of emeralds.

countries.name: Ethiopia
countries.funFact: Ethiopia is the only African country with its own alphabet.

countries.name: Chile
countries.funFact: Chile is home to the world's driest desert, the Atacama Desert.

countries.name: Kenya
countries.funFact: Kenya is famous for its long-distance runners.

countries.name: Poland
countries.funFact: Poland has the largest castle in the world (Malbork Castle).

countries.name: Nigeria
countries.funFact: Nigeria is the most populous country in Africa.

countries.name: Saudi Arabia
countries.funFact: Saudi Arabia is the world's largest oil exporter.

countries.name: Sweden
countries.funFact: Sweden is known for its high quality of life and innovation.

countries.name: Norway
countries.funFact: Norway is known for its stunning fjords.

countries.name: Finland
countries.funFact: Finland is known as the land of a thousand lakes, though it actually has around 188,000 lakes.

countries.name: Bangladesh
countries.funFact: Bangladesh is the most densely populated country in the world.

countries.name: Pakistan
countries.funFact: Pakistan is home to the second-highest peak in the world, K2.

countries.name: Egypt
countries.funFact: Egypt is famous for its ancient pyramids.

countries.name: Vietnam
countries.funFact: Vietnam is one of the world's largest producers of coffee.

countries.name: Thailand
countries.funFact: Thailand is the only Southeast Asian country that was never colonized by a European power.

countries.name: Philippines
countries.funFact: The Philippines is made up of over 7,600 islands.

countries.name: Iran
countries.funFact: Iran is one of the world's oldest civilizations, with historical and urban settlements dating back to 4000 BC.

countries.name: Venezuela
countries.funFact: Venezuela is home to the world's highest uninterrupted waterfall, Angel Falls.

countries.name: Ukraine
countries.funFact: Ukraine is the largest country entirely in Europe.

countries.name: Iraq
countries.funFact: Iraq is often referred to as the cradle of civilization as it is home to some of the oldest human settlements.

countries.name: Sudan
countries.funFact: Sudan has more pyramids than Egypt.

countries.name: Peru
countries.funFact: Peru is home to the ancient Inca city of Machu Picchu.

countries.name: Malaysia
countries.funFact: Malaysia is known for its diverse ecosystems, from the beaches of Borneo to the mountains of the Malay Peninsula.

countries.name: Afghanistan
countries.funFact: Afghanistan is known for its rugged mountains and ancient history.

countries.name: Morocco
countries.funFact: Morocco is home to the Sahara Desert, the largest hot desert in the world.

countries.name: Angola
countries.funFact: Angola is rich in natural resources, particularly oil and diamonds.

countries.name: Ghana
countries.funFact: Ghana was the first African nation to gain independence from colonial rule in 1957.

countries.name: Yemen
countries.funFact: Yemen is home to the ancient city of Sana'a, one of the oldest continuously inhabited cities in the world.

countries.name: Uzbekistan
countries.funFact: Uzbekistan is one of the only two doubly landlocked countries in the world.

countries.name: Nepal
countries.funFact: Nepal is home to Mount Everest, the world's highest peak.

countries.name: Mozambique
countries.funFact: Mozambique has some of the most beautiful coral reefs in the world.

countries.name: Madagascar
countries.funFact: Madagascar is famous for its unique wildlife, 90% of which is found nowhere else on Earth.

countries.name: Ivory Coast
countries.funFact: Ivory Coast is the world's largest producer of cocoa beans.

countries.name: North Korea
countries.funFact: North Korea is one of the most secretive countries in the world.

countries.name: Sri Lanka
countries.funFact: Sri Lanka is known as the 'Pearl of the Indian Ocean' due to its shape and location.

countries.name: Romania
countries.funFact: Romania is home to the world's heaviest building, the Palace of the Parliament.

countries.name: Kazakhstan
countries.funFact: Kazakhstan is the largest landlocked country in the world.

countries.name: Syria
countries.funFact: Syria is home to one of the oldest continuously inhabited cities in the world, Damascus.

countries.name: Cameroon
countries.funFact: Cameroon is known as 'Africa in miniature' because it exhibits all the major climates and vegetation of the continent.

countries.name: Niger
countries.funFact: Niger is one of the hottest countries in the world.

countries.name: Netherlands
countries.funFact: The Netherlands is known for its windmills, tulips, and canals.

countries.name: Mali
countries.funFact: Mali was home to the ancient empire of Mali, known for its wealth and the famous city of Timbuktu.

countries.name: Burkina Faso
countries.funFact: Burkina Faso hosts the International Arts and Crafts Fair, one of Africa's most important cultural events.

countries.name: Gabon
countries.funFact: Gabon is home to some of the oldest rainforests in Africa.

countries.name: Zambia
countries.funFact: Zambia is home to Victoria Falls, one of the largest and most famous waterfalls in the world.

countries.name: Zimbabwe
countries.funFact: Zimbabwe is known for its incredible wildlife and national parks.

countries.name: Chad
countries.funFact: Chad is named after Lake Chad, which is the largest wetland in Chad and the second-largest in Africa.

countries.name: South Sudan
countries.funFact: South Sudan is the youngest country in the world, gaining independence in 2011.

countries.name: Somalia
countries.funFact: Somalia has the longest coastline on Africa's mainland.

countries.name: Cuba
countries.funFact: Cuba is known for its classic cars and cigars.

countries.name: Jordan
countries.funFact: Jordan is home to the ancient city of Petra, one of the New Seven Wonders of the World.

countries.name: Honduras
countries.funFact: Honduras is known for its rich Mayan history and beautiful Caribbean beaches.
